channel.title: FutureScape | The Time Is Now| VPS | Check It Out
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339071/fs.png[/img]
[SIZE=6]Futurescape[/SIZE] [SIZE=4]The Time Is Now[/SIZE]
Introduction
Futurescape is a 24/7 0% lagg PI server. We have many things for you to do so you don't get bored. The server has been online for 3 months now. We are constantly getting nice compliments of people who have tried FutureScape. Are you going to be the next?
[URL=http://"www.futurescapersps.com"][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3339118/YAN1.png[/img][SIZE=4][B]Forums[/B][/SIZE][/URL] [URL=http://"http://futurescapersps.com/play.php"][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3339107/Play-1-Hot-icon.png[/img][SIZE=4][B]Play Now[/B][/SIZE][/URL] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/qdpmbdouks4jgua/Futurescape%20Client.jar?token_hash=AAFG4OV6m_wUkvCq8I0nUKDvlCHwLYENjBYnVAb5hRmQ0w&dl=1"][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3339091/Download.png[/img][SIZE=4][B]Download Now[/B][/SIZE][/URL]
[B]Features[/B]
[SIZE=4]Client Sided :[/SIZE] *Experiance, Hp, Pray, Running orbs *
* Ingame settings * Hitpoint Bar On/Off Game Menu On/Off Names On/Off Gameframes : 377, 474, 483, 508, 525, 562 Hitmarks On/Off Damage x10 On/Off
* Clanchat * * All animations * * Donator tab : Full Killcount for GW, Spellbook switcher, Member Zone * * Items keept on death * * Lock/Unlock experiance *
Bank Deposit all items Note items, See how much items inbank.
* Items * Almost all items and some costum items Special Attack's Gfx, Animations, Emotes, Effects
*All pray options [I]All curses[/I] * *Ancient, and Lunar telebook * *Clipping follow, Clipping combat *
And much more!
[SIZE=4]Server Sided[/SIZE] * 24/7 Vps hosting * * 0% lagg * * Costum commands for members * * Verry stable * * All single, Double doors * * Many NPC's all over the world * * All skills are trainable * * Good starter packet * * Automatic donation system * * Automatic vote for cash system * And much more!
[SIZE=4]Teleports[/SIZE] * Monsters - Rock Crabs, Taverley Dungeon, Slayer Tower, Brimhaven Dungeon, Hill Gaints
* Minigames - Barrows, Pest Control, TzHaar Cave, Duel Arena, Warrior Guild
* Bosses - Godwars, King Black Dragon, Dagganoth Kings, Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demons, Icy Bones, Balance Elemental, Sea Troll Queen, Nomad, Bal'lak the Pummeller, Daint Mole, Kalphite Queen, Phoenix Lair, Rammernauts, Arzinian Avatars
* Pvp zones - Mage Bank, Green Dragons, Edgeville, Ardougne, Yanille, Castle Pk, UnNamed
* Skill Zone - All un-combat skill's are trainable here [I]Not agility and hunter[/I]
* City Teleports - Lumbridge, Edgeville, Camelot, Falador, Canafis
* Agility & Hunter [I]Level up you agility and hunter here[/I]
[SIZE=4]Donator Benefits :[/SIZE] Donator Tab, Costum Titles, Member Shop, Five & Blackjack, Member bosses, And more!
[SIZE=4]Forums :[/SIZE] vBulletin, Active forums, All Updates, Questions, Guides, Show-off, Everything else you find in the forums
[SIZE=4]Media : [/SIZE] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3338953/1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3338959/2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3338962/3.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3338967/4.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3338993/5.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3338998/6.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339001/7.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339003/8.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339006/9.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339014/10.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339016/11.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339020/12.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339022/13.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339050/14.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339028/15.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339034/16.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339036/17.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339037/Schermafbeelding__150_.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3339703/Futurescape_Logo_part_1.jpg[/img]
[SIZE=4]Thanks For Reading[/SIZE] Special thanks to Goatman45621 for helping me edit this up.[/CENTER]

item.description:
@Skaffa wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=6]Futurescape[/SIZE]
[SIZE=4]The Time Is Now[/SIZE]

Introduction

Futurescape is a 24/7 0% lagg PI server.
We have many things for you to do so you don’t get bored.
The server has been online for 3 months now.
We are constantly getting nice compliments of people who have tried FutureScape.
Are you going to be the next?

[SIZE=4]Forums[/SIZE] [SIZE=4]Play Now[/SIZE] [SIZE=4]Download Now[/SIZE]

Features

[SIZE=4]Client Sided :[/SIZE]
*Experiance, Hp, Pray, Running orbs *

  • Ingame settings *
    Hitpoint Bar On/Off
    Game Menu On/Off
    Names On/Off
    Gameframes : 377, 474, 483, 508, 525, 562
    Hitmarks On/Off
    Damage x10 On/Off

  • Clanchat *

  • All animations *

  • Donator tab : Full Killcount for GW, Spellbook switcher, Member Zone *

  • Items keept on death *

  • Lock/Unlock experiance *

Bank
Deposit all items
Note items,
See how much items inbank.

    Almost all items and some costum items
    Special Attack’s
    Gfx, Animations, Emotes, Effects

*All pray options All curses *
*Ancient, and Lunar telebook *
*Clipping follow, Clipping combat *

And much more!

[SIZE=4]Server Sided[/SIZE]

  • 24/7 Vps hosting *
  • 0% lagg *
  • Costum commands for members *
  • Verry stable *
  • All single, Double doors *
  • Many NPC’s all over the world *

    And much more!

[SIZE=4]Teleports[/SIZE]

  • Monsters - Rock Crabs, Taverley Dungeon, Slayer Tower, Brimhaven Dungeon, Hill Gaints

  • Minigames - Barrows, Pest Control, TzHaar Cave, Duel Arena, Warrior Guild

  • Bosses - Godwars, King Black Dragon, Dagganoth Kings, Corporeal Beast, Tormented Demons,
    Icy Bones, Balance Elemental, Sea Troll Queen, Nomad, Bal’lak the Pummeller, Daint Mole,
    Kalphite Queen, Phoenix Lair, Rammernauts, Arzinian Avatars

  • Pvp zones - Mage Bank, Green Dragons, Edgeville, Ardougne, Yanille, Castle Pk, UnNamed

  • Skill Zone - All un-combat skill’s are trainable here Not agility and hunter

  • City Teleports - Lumbridge, Edgeville, Camelot, Falador, Canafis

  • Agility & Hunter Level up you agility and hunter here

[SIZE=4]Donator Benefits :[/SIZE]
Donator Tab, Costum Titles, Member Shop, Five & Blackjack, Member bosses, And more!
